result.title: "Report on organization of theoretical workshop - ""Adoptive immunotherapy for cancer"""
result.description: Report on organized workshop will include an agenda, a list of participants, presentations and conclusions. Each of the reports will be complemented by an evaluation on whether the concerned activities contribute to the Research Potential increase of the applicants and the necessary measures to be taken in order to preserve the sustainability of the implemented actions or benefits. result.title: Complete set of training materials for non-nuclear professionals and subcontractors
result.description: Task 1: Development of a complete set of training materials for non-nuclear professionals and subcontractors Subtask 1: Search for already developed training materials, selection, collection and integration of training materials for the training programs Subtask 2: Review the existing training materials and identify deficiencies Subtask 3: Update and translation of the available training materials Subtask 3: Develop new training materials and translation of the new ones on: - Introduction to NPP - Overview on NPP's - Radiation Monitoring - NPP Safety Concepts - Emergency Planning and Emergency Preparedness - Management System - Radiation Protection - Radioactive Waste Management - Decommissioning of NPP

result.title: Complete set of training materials for VVER technology and non-power nuclear applications for students
result.description: Task 1: Development of a complete set of training materials for VVER technology and non-power nuclear applications for students Subtask 1: Search for already developed training materials, selection, collection and integration of training materials for the training programs Subtask 2: Review the existing training materials and identify deficiencies Subtask 3: Update and translation of the available training materials Subtask 3: Develop new training materials and translation of the new ones on: - Milestones, main phases and main issues within establishment of Infrastructure for nuclear power programs - Legal and regulatory basics for nuclear materials security and non-proliferation - New course on Non-proliferation and Nuclear Security Culture

result.title: Complete set of training materials for nuclear professionals and researchers
result.description: Task 1: Development of a complete set of training materials for nuclear professionals and researchers Subtask 1: Search for already developed training materials, selection, collection and integration of training materials for the training programs Subtask 2: Review the existing training materials and identify deficiencies Subtask 3: Update and translation of the available training materials Subtask 3: Develop new training materials and translation of the new ones on: - Basic of Infrastructure for a Nuclear Power Program - NPP Safety Concepts - QA policy: Integrated Management System - NPP Policy - PSA and its application - Severe Accidents Management - Nuclear Knowledge Management - VVER reactors evolution (generation III and IV)
